title-group.article-title: Des petits récits et du grand récit. Raconter l'histoire de la littérature québécoise

abstract.p: The notion of story is a major issue underpinning the present interest in literary history; eliminated in the 1960s, stories now proliferate, as in the study of Québécois literature. But its historiography - all historiography - without solving the problem, may escape it as literature.
